about.motivation: A few years ago, I have had the pleasure to turn my passion for Mobile and Web Development into some kind of a job. Started with simple Wordpress sites for clients in my city I gained experiences in Web Development early

projects.whitebird: is an open-source, web-based, collaborative, digital Whiteboard built with NestJS, MongoDB, NuxtJs and FabricJs
projects.whitebird_task: As a Front-end Developer, I was responsible for the overall design and appearance of the application. One of the most exciting experience was the work with Bulma
projects.conForm: is a program that allows the user to create, edit and save multiple concept papers. In order to simplify the creation of a concept paper, a web application should be developed that will replace the conventional download, fill in, edit and upload again of each paper. Each group should have the opportunity to work on the their concept paper in their own session. Access should be guaranteed via user authentification and join codes
projects.conForm_task: In this project I was involved as frontend as well as backend developer. My task was on the one hand to create the design, and on the other hand I took over the routes as well as the persistence of the data. One of the most exciting experiences was working with the backend framework: Laravel
projects.hly: was a project within the study whose aim was to generate a positive opinion among consumers and thus to win more customers for the still unknown beverage
projects.menschenhelfen: is a website whose goal is to attract as many people as possible to donate blood in the region
projects.menschenhelfen_task: I redesigned the website from scratch to highlight its goal and generally increase the usability of the site. The interaction should be made as pleasant as possible for the user

experience.eyeled_desc: Development of mobile user interfaces in Swift, as well as web development
experience.thesis: Implementation of a GPS-based pedestrian navigation component for outdoor exhibition grounds with optimized user guidance on mobile devices under Objective-C in iOS
experience.intern_desc: Internship in mobile software development with focus on iOS development
experience.study_deg: Bachelor of Science - BS, Media Computer Science
experience.study_master: Master of Science, MS, Computer Science
